title: Workshop on Designing a Game-Based Learning System for Vocational Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of game design and introductory knowledge in vocational training
context.additional_context: Environment emphasizing collaborative design activities utilizing board games and digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more game mechanics tailored to vocational training scenarios.
Collaborate with team members to complete one or more game-based learning scenarios.
Integrate two or more learner motivation elements using creative problem-solving techniques.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
